title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 31 October 2016 - XWiki
content:
<jonesmeier> has quit  
02:28 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki  
06:38 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:00 <mflorea> has quit  
09:30 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:03 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
13:06 <msmeria> has quit  
14:07 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
14:22 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:22 <msmeria1> has quit  
15:06 <amack2> has joined #xwiki  
15:07 <amack2> Hi, I have a customer with a very old xwiki version, 1.9.4. Is there a way to obtain the source code for this version? I found only the link to the wayback machine of svnsearch and it seems it's not accessible  
15:10 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
15:11 <msmeria> has quit  
15:25 <ClemensR> amack2: uh, oh, this seems to be lost in the mist of time. source code has been migrated to github, e.g.:   https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform   but the actual tag for the 1.9.4 release seems to have been lost  
15:26 <ClemensR> I think it can be somewhat reconstructed as the commit where the version number in the pom.xml changes to 1.9.4, at least in theory  
15:29 <ClemensR> uh, oh, no, it is on a branch "xwiki-core-1.9" which seemingly did not get migrated, unless I am overlooking something (which I often do, however)  
15:42 <amack2> ClemensR: thanks. Is there something "close" to that release? I need only core, the LDAP authentication  
15:44 <ClemensR> amack2:  propably the closes is the commit where the 1.9-brnach was created:  https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/665205ba2801aa07a65a2dd067e3a627e3e5862a  I did not check this out to see if the LDAP Authenicator was in the code then  
15:46 <ClemensR> amack2: instead it might be this one here:  https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/xwiki-authenticator-trusted-ldap  
15:47 <amack2> ClemensR: thanks!  
15:47 <ClemensR> it is old enough to have been included in 1.9.4, I think ;)  
15:48 <ClemensR> I hope  I sent you and the right track, as I am not involved long enough to have first hand experience with these versions  
16:19 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
16:22 <msmeria1> has quit  
17:33 <amack2> has left #xwiki  
17:46 <msmeria> has quit
